title: 18 - Jennie and Francis Chan Talk about Unity and the Church.
description:
What does it look like for the church to come together in unity? Join us as we talk about what God is doing, how humility plays a part, and what the path forward is for the church in the West to love each other and show a hurting world a good God.

Get Francis Chan's new book ASAP: https://www.amazon.com/Until-Unity-Francis-Chan/dp/0830782729/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=until+unity&qid=1617241689&sr=8-1

Check out all the amazing shoes, bags and masks available right now at Rothys.com/madeforthis.
